nodes.text: The Annual Batuu Holochess Tournament was a holochess tournament held each year on the planet Batuu. Koopla Nanuk hosted a broadcast of the event one year on radio station BSO 401.72, which was played in Black Spire Outpost during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
The Annual Batuu Holochess Tournament was first created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
